Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Application no. 20005356 TCM, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of Joe's Public, LLC, to establish, maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 425 Lafayette Street, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 2.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.

Application no. 20005409 GFM, pursuant to §363 of the Charter of the City of New York, concerning a proposed Authorizing Resolution authorizing the Department Of Transportation to grant a franchise for the provision of aerial tramway service over the East River between Manhattan and Roosevelt Island to the Roosevelt Island Operating Corporation.
Items.MatterName: UDAAP, Aerial Tramway Service, Manhattan and Roosevelt Island, (20005409GFM)

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending:  Spigner, Carrion, Linares, Miller, Perkins, Eisland and Lopez.
